nodes.text: The Imperial Department of Resources, also known as Imperial Mining, was a bureau within the Imperial government. It supervised the development and/or exploitation of star systems, usually for the purposes of mineral extraction and colonization. A represtative of the Imperial Department of Resources, Captain-Supervisor Grammel was commander of the Imperial Military garrison and energy mining operation on the planet Mimban in the year 2 ABY.
The Imperial Department of Resources was originally created for Splinter of the Mind's Eye, a Star Wars Legends novel written by Alan Dean Foster and released on February 12, 1978.
